oai_dc:dc.dc:source: [Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of an obituary by the French missionary Eugene Casalis, being a booklet published as an extract from the French missionary periodical Journal des Missions evangeliques. The obituary commemorates Entouta Manoah, first Christian convert to die in Lesotho.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fhya-depot
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notice biographique sur la vie, la conversion et la mort de Manoah, membre de l'eglise de Thaba-Bossiou, chez les Bechuanas-Bassoutos (Afrique Meridionale)
